alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:43PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Albany County through 215 PM MDT... At 142 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Wheatland Reservoir 3 to 6 miles southeast of Rock River. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bosler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County; Laramie Valley; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; South Laramie Range
